title: English Man In New York
lyrics:
[intro]
(Em)  (A)  (Bm)  x2
 
(Em) I don't drink (A)coffee I take (Bm)tea my dear
(Em) I like my (A)toast done on the (Bm)side 
(Em) And you can (A)hear it in my (Bm)accent when I talk
I'm an (G)Englishman (A)in New York (Bm)
 
(Em) See me (A)walking down Fifth (Bm)Avenue
(Em) A walking (A)cane here at my (Bm)side
(Em) I take it (A)everywhere I (Bm)walk
I'm an (G)Englishman (A)in New York (Bm)
 
[chorus]
(Em) I'm an (A)alien (F#m)I'm a legal (Bm7)alien
I'm an (G)Englishman (A)in New York (Bm)
(Em) I'm an (A)alien (F#m)I'm a legal (Bm7)alien
I'm an (G)Englishman (A)in New York (Bm)
 
(Em) If "manners (A)maketh man" as (Bm)someone said
(Em) Then he's the (A)hero of the (Bm)day
(Em) It takes a (A)man to suffer (Bm)ignorance and smile
Be your(G)self no (A)matter what they (Bm)say
 
[chorus]
(Em) I'm an (A)alien (F#m)I'm a legal (Bm7)alien
I'm an (G)Englishman (A)in New York (Bm)
(Em) I'm an (A)alien (F#m)I'm a legal (Bm7)alien
I'm an (G)Englishman (A)in New York (Bm)
 
[bridge]
(D)Modesty, propriety can (A)lead to notoriety
(Bm7)You could end up as the only (F#)one
(G)Gentleness, sobriety are (A)rare in this society
At (F#)night a candle's brighter than the (Bm)sun
 
[interlude] (Em)  (A)  (Bm) x2 
 
(Em) Takes more than (A)combat gear to (Bm)make a man
(Em) Takes more than (A)license for a (Bm)gun
(Em) Confront your (A)enemies, a(Bm)void them when you can
A (G)gentleman will (A)walk but never (Bm)run
 
(Em) If "manners (A)maketh man" as (Bm)someone said
(Em) Then he's the (A)hero of the (Bm)day
(Em) It takes a (A)man to suffer (Bm)ignorance and smile
Be your(G)self no (A)matter what they (Bm)say
Be your(G)self no (A)matter what they (Bm)say
 
[chorus]
(Em) I'm an (A)alien (F#m)I'm a legal (Bm7)alien
I'm an (G)Englishman (A)in New York (Bm)
(Em) I'm an (A)alien (F#m)I'm a legal (Bm7)alien
I'm an (G)Englishman (A)in New York (Bm) [end on Bm]
